name: Reliant Imaging
description: Exports a vast array of Medical Equipmen
overview:
Established in the year 2011, we, “Reliant Imaging Diagnostic Pvt Ltd.”, are an eminent organization that manufactures, supplies, imports and exports a vast array of Medical Equipment and X-Ray Machines. Our array of products encompasses Digital X-Ray Machine, Cynosure Product, C-Arm System, CR X-Ray System, DR Plate, Surgical Table, MRI System & RPACS.

Our Products: C-Arm System CR X-Ray System DR Plate Surgical Table

Our Team: Our team which greatly supports us in all the trade activities. The dedicated, hardworking and sincere professionals working with us are masters of their respective fields of specialization. Our experts employ rich industry experience and immense domain expertise to accomplish the assigned tasks in a successful manner.

Infrastructure: We have established a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility at our premises for executing the business process in a streamlined manner. Spread over an extensive area, this facility is empowered with advanced technology and high tech machines that help us in utilizing the resources in a judicious manner.

Quality Assurance: Since commencement, quality has been the main motto of our organization. The range we offer is manufactured using optimum-grade material that is sourced from vendors of high repute after doing an extensive research of the market. Advanced technology and latest machines are employed in the manufacturing process following industry set guidelines.
